# texture

**Instance Property**

A Metal texture object that contains the drawable’s contents.

## Declaration

```swift
var texture: any MTLTexture { get }
```

## Discussion

Use this object to configure a [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Metal/MTLRenderPipelineColorAttachmentDescriptor] object to render to the drawable object.
title: texture
